name: Battle Snakes - LD
description:
Made in 48 hours for MiniLD #67.

A simple variation of snake. It is two player only.

Inspired by the 'Anaconda' mini game found in Timesplitters 2.

Player 1 controls: W, A, D

Player 2 controls: Up, Left, Right

If you crash you lose half your length. There is no end to the game.
